title: Blended Course for Enhancing Information Literacy Among Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and understanding of job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Focused on enhancing information utilization competencies for current practitioners to improve work efficiency and decision-making

learning_goals: Learners can apply a three-stage verification process to evaluate the credibility and appropriateness of diverse information sources.
Learners can develop and implement an integrated information-gathering strategy using academic databases and industry reports to solve workplace problems.
Learners can revise drafts of job-related reports citing sources clearly based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
